explains: n. 利口酒；白酒；烧酒；香酒

sentences.en: I like to macerate the food in liqueur for a few minutes before serving.
sentences.cn: 我想把食物在利口酒里泡几分钟后再享用。

sentences.en: The liqueur is strong but too sour yet.
sentences.cn: 这种酒虽浓但还是太酸。

sentences.en: Cherry liqueur on the left, cornel - on the right!
sentences.cn: 左边是樱桃酒，右边是山茱萸酒。
